Package org.apache.hadoop.fs.viewfs

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constants
    Config variable prefixes for ViewFs - see ViewFs for examples.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChRootedFileSystem
    ChRootedFileSystem is a file system with its root some path below the root of its base file system.
    ChRootedFs
    ChrootedFs is a file system with its root some path below the root of its base file system.
    ConfigUtil
    Utilities for config variables of the viewFs See ViewFs
    InodeTree<T>
    InodeTree implements a mount-table as a tree of inodes.
    InodeTree.INode<T>
    Internal class for inode tree
    InodeTree.INodeDir<T>
    Internal class to represent an internal dir of the mount table
    InodeTree.INodeLink<T>
    In internal class to represent a mount link A mount link can be single dir link or a merge dir link.
    InodeTree.MountPoint<T>  
    InodeTree.ResolveResult<T>
    Resolve returns ResolveResult.
    TestChRootedFileSystem  
    TestChRootedFileSystem.MockFileSystem  
    TestChRootedFs  
    TestFcCreateMkdirLocalFs  
    TestFcMainOperationsLocalFs  
    TestFcPermissionsLocalFs  
    TestFSMainOperationsLocalFileSystem  
    TestViewFileSystemDelegation
    Verify that viewfs propagates certain methods to the underlying fs
    TestViewFileSystemDelegation.FakeFileSystem  
    TestViewFileSystemDelegationTokenSupport
    Test ViewFileSystem's support for having delegation tokens fetched and cached for the file system.
    TestViewFileSystemDelegationTokenSupport.FakeFileSystem  
    TestViewFileSystemLocalFileSystem
    Test the ViewFileSystemBaseTest using a viewfs with authority: viewfs://mountTableName/ ie the authority is used to load a mount table.
    TestViewFileSystemWithAuthorityLocalFileSystem
    Test the ViewFsBaseTest using a viewfs with authority: viewfs://mountTableName/ ie the authority is used to load a mount table.
    TestViewFsConfig  
    TestViewfsFileStatus
    The FileStatus is being serialized in MR as jobs are submitted.
    TestViewFsLocalFs  
    TestViewFsTrash  
    TestViewFsURIs  
    TestViewFsWithAuthorityLocalFs
    Test the ViewFsBaseTest using a viewfs with authority: viewfs://mountTableName/ ie the authority is used to load a mount table.
    ViewFileSystem
    ViewFileSystem (extends the FileSystem interface) implements a client-side mount table.
    ViewFileSystem.InternalDirOfViewFs  
    ViewFileSystem.MountPoint  
    ViewFileSystemBaseTest
    A collection of tests for the ViewFileSystem.
    ViewFileSystemTestSetup
    This class is for setup and teardown for viewFileSystem so that it can be tested via the standard FileSystem tests.
    ViewFs
    ViewFs (extends the AbstractFileSystem interface) implements a client-side mount table.
    ViewFs.InternalDirOfViewFs  
    ViewFs.MountPoint  
    ViewFsBaseTest
    A collection of tests for the ViewFs.
    ViewFsFileStatus
    This class is needed to address the problem described in ViewFileSystem.getFileStatus(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path) and ViewFs.getFileStatus(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path)
    ViewFsTestSetup
    This class is for setup and teardown for viewFs so that it can be tested via the standard FileContext tests.
